sentence.Network_en: They are assured of an enjoyable and trouble - free holiday.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们肯定会过一个愉快的无忧无虑的假日.

sentence.Network_en: The carnival got off to a virtually trouble-free start with the police reporting only one arrest.
sentence.Network_cn: 狂欢节开幕进行得几乎是一帆风顺，警方只报告了一例拘捕。

sentence.Network_en: None of the new design principles is easy or trouble - free.
sentence.Network_cn: 新的设计原理没有一个是简单易行,毫无麻烦的.

entry.tran: 顺利的;没问题的;没困难的
entry.def: Something that is trouble-free does not cause any problems or difficulties.
